name: ASOCIACION DE USUARIOS DE INTERNET
goal: The Association of Internet Users aims to defend the interests of Internet Users and new technologies and to ensure their fair use.
interests: Culture, Environment, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Youth
